properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Matagorda Bay; Galveston Bay
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 16 at 3:09AM CST until February 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one quarter to one
half mile or worse.

* WHERE...Matagorda Bay, Galveston Bay, Coastal waters from
Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM and Coastal
waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Sunday with slow improvement after 9 am
through 11 am.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING
